text: Na'ankure tamagra mananentake zantamima kre mnavu ofaramima nehuta, Ra Anumzamofo avufi kumi nehuta, Ra Anumzamofo nanekea amagera nonteta, agri kasegene tra kenena rutagre'naze. Ana nehuta Agri eri'zama keama'ma osaza zanku huno knazana atregeno eme tamazeri haviza higeno, eno ama knarera ehanati'ne.
